document.full_text: the nato-led force in afghanistan said on wednesday it was investigating yet another air strike that had apparently gone wrong, this time killing two children, and had suspended one of its commanders and grounded a helicopter crew.
document.title: nato probes civilian casualties after aghan boys killed
lines_and_colors: the nato-led force in afghanistan said on wednesday it was investigating yet another air strike that had apparently gone wrong, this time killing two children, and had suspended one of its commanders and grounded a helicopter crew.
